headline.main: Berlin Evacuation Ordered; Hamburg's Fate Stirs Fears; BERLIN EVACUATION IS BEGUN IN HASTE

lead_paragraph: STOCKHOLM, Sweden, Aug. 1 -- Berlin is to be evacuated immediately. Fears that Berlin would come to the same fate as that dealt out to Cologne, Essen and Hamburg have led Dr. Joseph Goebbels, as Gauleiter of Berlin, to order the evacuation. Leaflets dropped into Berlin mailboxes today stated that those persons not obliged to remain for military reasons should leave at the earliest possible moment.
abstract: Goebbels orders partial Berlin evacuation; fear that city will suffer same fate as Hamburg said to have caused order; eyewitnesses describe Hamburg raids havoc
